long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A customizable dark theme for pinterest.com.

! Please enable the extension through the pop-up menu. !

Features:
- Uses the original color palett.
- Does not invert colors.
- Supports settings menu.

- The User can change: 
1. Rounding of images
1. Corners indentation

Update 0.1.8:
- Fix pinterest new load system

Project Github: https://github.com/VitaliyMubarakov/PinterestNuar
